changeSet.author: European Dynamics SA
changeSet.comment: Insert initial segment type configuration for current ENEDIS devices.
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO device_module_config (id, config_key, config_value, device_id) SELECT UUID() AS id, 'segment_consumer' AS config_key, 'true' AS config_value, id AS device_id FROM device WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM device_module_config WHERE device_id = device.id AND (config_key = 'segment_consumer' OR config_key = 'segment_producer') );
